title: Requires the development of a program addressing the problem of wrong way drivers on New York interstate highways
summary: Requires the commissioner of the department of transportation in consultation with the department of motor vehicles to develop a program addressing the problem of wrong way drivers on New York interstate highways.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          938

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by Sens. MARCELLINO, MAZIARZ -- read twice and ordered print-
         ed,  and  when printed to be committed to the Committee on Transporta-
         tion

       AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to requiring  the  develop-
         ment  of  a program addressing the problem of wrong way drivers on New
         York interstate highways

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  highway law is amended by adding a new section 67 to
    2  read as follows:
    3    S 67. WRONG WAY DRIVER PROGRAM. 1. WITHIN ONE YEAR  OF  THE  EFFECTIVE
    4  DATE  OF  THIS SECTION, THE COMMISSIONER SHALL, IN CONSULTATION WITH THE
    5  NEW YORK STATE DEPARTMENT  OF  MOTOR  VEHICLES,  DEVELOP  A  PROGRAM  TO
    6  ADDRESS  THE  PROBLEM  OF WRONG WAY DRIVERS ON NEW YORK INTERSTATE HIGH-
    7  WAYS.
    8    2. SUCH PROGRAM SHALL:
    9    A. INVESTIGATE POSSIBLE REASONS FOR THE PROBLEM OF WRONG  WAY  DRIVERS
   10  ON NEW YORK INTERSTATE HIGHWAYS;
   11    B. ASSESS WHAT OTHER STATES HAVE DONE TO ADDRESS THIS PROBLEM;
   12    C. SET FORTH POSSIBLE SOLUTIONS TO THE PROBLEM; AND
   13    D.  IMPLEMENT  MEASURES  TO REDUCE THE PROBLEM OF WRONG WAY DRIVERS ON
   14  NEW YORK INTERSTATE HIGHWAYS.
   15    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04433-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to requiring the development of a program addressing the problem of wrong way drivers on New York interstate highways
